events.name: Level
events.comment: qual level o jogador está no momento

parameters.value: A_Weapons.At (4, Dict_Save_File.Get(Weapon_ID_1), tokenat( Weapon_ID_1, 1, "_" ) ) > 0 ? A_Weapons.At (4, Dict_Save_File.Get(Weapon_ID_1), tokenat( Weapon_ID_1, 1, "_" ) ) : 0
A_Weapons.At (4, Dict_Save_File.Get(Weapon_ID_2), tokenat( Weapon_ID_2, 1, "_" ) ) > 0 ? A_Weapons.At (4, Dict_Save_File.Get(Weapon_ID_2), tokenat( Weapon_ID_2, 1, "_" ) ) : 0

functionParameters.name: Spawner
functionParameters.comment: qual spawner o zumbi deverá aparecer

functionParameters.name: IsShield
functionParameters.comment: para spawnar um txt para o escudo

functionParameters.name: Friendly
functionParameters.comment: é para ser usado em si mesmo

parameters.message: "Player Action: "&Action_Type&" | "& Action_ID & " - Lvl "&Action_Lvl & " > tar "&Target_ID& " [ All: "&All_Targets&" / Fri: "&Friendly&" ]"

children.text: Se tem block, aplica o dano perfurante separado do dano padrão

parameters: A_Weapons.At ( 2, Action_Lvl, Action_ID ) > 0 ? -1 * ( A_Weapons.At ( 2, Action_Lvl, Action_ID ) ) : 0

children.text: Se não tem block, soma o dano perfurante com o dano padrão

parameters: A_Weapons.At ( 2, Action_Lvl, Action_ID ) > 0 ? -1 * ( ( A_Weapons.At ( 2, Action_Lvl, Action_ID ) ) + ( A_Weapons.At ( 3, Action_Lvl, Action_ID ) ) ) : -1 * ( A_Weapons.At ( 3, Action_Lvl, Action_ID ) )

children.text: Se houver fogo existente, reseta a duração.
Se não houver fogo existente, aplica o efeito com valores originais

parameters.value: A_Habilities.At(3, Action_Lvl, Action_ID ) & "_" & A_Habilities.At(4, Action_Lvl, Action_ID )

parameters.text: "[icon=dmg] " & A_Weapons.At( 2, Dict_Save_File.Get( "WP_" & counter ), counter ) & " | " & "[icon=pdmg] " & A_Weapons.At( 3, Dict_Save_File.Get( "WP_" & counter ), counter ) & " | [icon=ammo] " & A_Weapons.At( 4, Dict_Save_File.Get( "WP_" & counter ), counter )  & newline & "[icon=special] " & A_Weapons.At( 5, Dict_Save_File.Get( "WP_" & counter ), counter )

"[icon=dmg] " & A_Weapons.At( 2, Dict_Save_File.Get( "WP_" & counter ), counter ) & " | " & "[icon=pdmg] " & A_Weapons.At( 3, Dict_Save_File.Get( "WP_" & counter ), counter ) & " | [icon=ammo] " & Wp_Slot.Ammo & "/" &Wp_Slot.Ammo_Max  & newline & "[icon=special] " & A_Weapons.At( 5, Dict_Save_File.Get( "WP_" & counter ), counter )

"[icon=dmg] " & A_Weapons.At( 2, Dict_Save_File.Get( "WP_" & counter ), counter ) &  " | " & "[icon=pdmg] " & A_Weapons.At( 3, Dict_Save_File.Get( "WP_" & counter ), counter ) & newline & "[icon=special] " & A_Weapons.At( 5, Dict_Save_File.Get( "WP_" & counter ), counter )

"[icon=dmg] " & A_Weapons.At( 2, Dict_Save_File.Get( "WP_" & counter ), counter ) & " | [icon=ammo] " & A_Weapons.At( 4, Dict_Save_File.Get( "WP_" & counter ), counter )  & newline & "[icon=special] " & A_Weapons.At( 5, Dict_Save_File.Get( "WP_" & counter ), counter )

"[icon=dmg] " & A_Weapons.At( 2, Dict_Save_File.Get( "WP_" & counter ), counter ) & " | [icon=ammo] " & Wp_Slot.Ammo & "/" &Wp_Slot.Ammo_Max  & newline & "[icon=special] " & A_Weapons.At( 5, Dict_Save_File.Get( "WP_" & counter ), counter )
"[icon=dmg] " & A_Weapons.At( 2, Dict_Save_File.Get( "WP_" & counter ), counter ) & newline & "[icon=special] " & A_Weapons.At( 5, Dict_Save_File.Get( "WP_" & counter ), counter )

"Instantly regenerate " & A_Habilities.At( 2, Dict_Save_File.Get( "HAB_" & counter ), counter ) & " energy shield back." & newline & "[icon=cd] " & A_Habilities.At( 5, Dict_Save_File.Get( "HAB_" & counter ), counter ) & " turns."

"Active a vitality power, capable of healing " & A_Habilities.At( 2, Dict_Save_File.Get( "HAB_" & counter ), counter ) & " HP." & newline & "[icon=cd] " & A_Habilities.At( 5, Dict_Save_File.Get( "HAB_" & counter ), counter ) & " turns."

"Area Attack. [icon=dmg] " & A_Habilities.At( 2, Dict_Save_File.Get( "HAB_" & counter ), counter ) & newline & "[icon=special] " & A_Habilities.At( 3, Dict_Save_File.Get( "HAB_" & counter ), counter ) & "  fire for " & A_Habilities.At( 4, Dict_Save_File.Get( "HAB_" & counter ), counter ) & " turns" & newline & "[icon=cd] " & A_Habilities.At( 5, Dict_Save_File.Get( "HAB_" & counter ), counter ) & " turns"

children.text: Madeira - Falta decidir como o jogo vai ler e aplicar as descrições das habilidades especiais da armadura
Se o turno for pra 4 ou mais, significa que é a vez do player jogar
Se o turno for de 1 a 3, significa que é a vez de um inimigo jogar

parameters.value: tokenat( Self.OnFire, 0, "_" ) & "_" & str( int( tokenat( Self.OnFire, 1, "_" ) ) - 1 )

children.text: Se o inimigo já estiver morto, então passa a vez pro próximo

functionParameters.name: Amount
functionParameters.comment: negative for damage / positive for heal

children.text: Após terminar de usar sua habilidade, o jogo espera um pouquinho e o turno para o próximo inimigo
Se for o final do tutorial, fecha o diálogo
Se não for um momento de escolha ou fim do tutorial, continua o texto
Se for o momento de escolha, aguarda o imput
